title: Oyo elevates Rakesh Kumar as CFO
description: Oyo announced the promotion of Rakesh Kumar to the position of Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Currently serving as Deputy CFO, Kumar has been instrumental in Oyo's financial stability during the Covid-19 pandemic, overseeing various financial functions. In his new role, he will continue to drive financial strategy.
